top_stories.title: Guidance: Regulators' Pioneer Fund round 4
top_stories.description: Regulators and local authorities can apply to the Regulators’ Pioneer Fund with initiatives that will help create a UK regulatory environment for business innovation and investment.

top_stories.title: Sir Chris Bryant speech at London Tech Week 2025
top_stories.description: Minister for Data Protection and Telecoms, Sir Chris Bryant, gave a speech at London Tech Week on Wednesday 11 June 2025.

top_stories.title: NVIDIA and Deutsche Telekom Partner to Advance Germany’s Sovereign AI
top_stories.description:
Industrial AI isn’t slowing down. Germany is ready. Following London Tech Week and GTC Paris at VivaTech, NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang’s European tour continued with a stop in Germany to discuss with Chancellor Friedrich Merz new partnerships poised to bring breakthrough innovations on the world’s first industrial AI cloud. This AI factory, to	
		Read Article
top_stories.author: Markus Hacker
